Class BikelChineseHeadFinder

java.lang.Object
  edu.jhu.coe.ling.AbstractCollinsHeadFinder
      edu.jhu.coe.ling.BikelChineseHeadFinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
HeadFinder, Serializable
public class BikelChineseHeadFinder
extends AbstractCollinsHeadFinder

A headfinder implementing Dan Bikel's head rules. March 2005: Updated to match the head-finding rules found in Bikel's thesis (2004).

Author:
Galen Andrew, Christopher Manning.
